constraints.description: We have to use 'CreateProject' as the first tool and can not use it subsequently
If we use the tool 'CalculateVacancyFormationEnergy', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateVacancyFormationEnergy', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' more than once
If we use the tool 'CalculateAntisiteFormationEnergy', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateAntisiteEnergy', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' more than once
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2Vac', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2Vac', we have to use the tool 'CreateVacancy' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE2Vac'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2Vac', we have to use 'CreateVacancyAl' or 'CreateVacancyFe' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2AS', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2AS', we have to use the tool 'CreateAntisite' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE2AS'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE2AS', we have to use 'CreateAntisiteAl' or 'CreateAntisiteFe' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1VacAB', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1VacAB', we have to use the tool 'CreateVacancy' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1VacAB'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1VacAB', we can not use 'CreateVacancyAl' or 'CreateVacancyFe' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASAB', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASAB', we have to use the tool 'CreateAntisite' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1ASAB'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASAB', we can not use 'CreateAntisiteAl' or 'CreateAntisiteFe' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacA', we have to use the tool 'CreateDefect' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacA'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateDefect'(;)> <'CreateDefect'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateDefect'(;)> F <'CreateDefect'(;)> F <'CreateDefect'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacA', we can not use 'CreateAntisite' or 'CreateVacancy' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacA', we can not use a combination of 'CreateDefectAl' and 'CreateDefectFe'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacA'(;)> true) | (!(F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacB', we have to use the tool 'CreateDefect' exactly two times
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacB'(;)> true) | ((F <'CreateDefect'(;)> <'CreateDefect'(;)> true) & (G ! <'CreateDefect'(;)> F <'CreateDefect'(;)> F <'CreateDefect'(;)> true))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacB', we can not use 'CreateAntisite' or 'CreateVacancy' twice
If we use the tool 'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacB', we can not use 'CreateDefectAl' or 'CreateDefectFe' twice
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateDFE1ASA1VacB'(;)> true) | (!(F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true) & !(F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true))
